verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah; set to Alamoth. A Song. <S%H430>God<s%> is our <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>, A <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H5833>help<s%> in <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.

Therefore will we not <S%H3372>fear<s%>, though the <S%H776>earth<s%> do <S%H4171>change<s%>, And though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> be <S%H4131>shaken<s%> into the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>;

Though the <S%H4325>waters<s%> thereof <S%H1993>roar<s%> and be <S%H2560>troubled<s%>, Though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>tremble<s%> with the <S%H1346>swelling<s%> <S%H5542>thereof<s%>. [[Selah

There is a <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H6388>streams<s%> whereof make <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, The <S%H6918>holy<s%> place of the <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H4131>her<s%>; She shall not be moved: <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H6437>her<s%>, and that right <S%H1242>early<s%>.
The <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1993>raged<s%>, the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> were <S%H4131>moved<s%>: He <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4127>melted<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is with <S%H430>us<s%>; The God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>refuge<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Come <S%H3212><s%>, <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H4659>works<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, What <S%H8047>desolations<s%> he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

He maketh <S%H4421>wars<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; He <S%H7665>breaketh<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H7112>cutteth<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> in <S%H7112>sunder<s%>; He <S%H8313>burneth<s%> the <S%H5699>chariots<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.
Be <S%H7503>still<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H430>God<s%>: I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is with <S%H430>us<s%>; The God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>refuge<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
